summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Bowen Place from Dawson Street to the south line of Columbia Heights 2nd Addition, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 106534 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
